pages.text: Raw Urushi (Japanese Lacquer) is neede to craft colored Urushi. To obtain Urushi, we first need to chisel a Lacquer Log by right-clicking with Flint or any tools.$(br2)Continues on the next page.
Right-click with Flint, Shovel, Axe, Hoe or Sword

Chiseled Lacquer Log evolves in texture over time.$(br2)On this stage, right-click with a bowl to get Raw Urushi.$(br2)Automate by using a Dispenser towards the Log, filling it with bowls.$(br2)Continues on the next page.
Tiny Red Dye or Tiny Black Dye can be crafted from Red or Black Dye.$(br2)Crat them with Raw Urushi for Red Urushi or Black Urushi.$(br2)Colored Urushi can color Planks and other wooden blocks.
